text: The 2018 Albanian Third Division was the 15th official season of the Albanian football fourth division since its establishment. The season began on 11 February 2018. There were 7 teams competing this season. Term gained promotion to the 2018-19 Albanian Second Division. Rubiku won their first Albanian Third Division title. ==Changes from last season== ===Team changes=== ====From Third Division==== Promoted to Albanian Second Division: * FC Klosi * Spartaku ===Stadia by capacity and locations=== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- !
